title: Executive Order 6220-Authorizing Appointment of Louis R. Glavis to Any Position in the Classified Civil Service
content: Mr. Louis R. Glavis, now serving in the excepted position of Director of Investigations, Department of the Interior, is hereby reinstated in the Civil Service without regard to any charges heretofore preferred against him, and may be appointed in any department, establishment, or office in the classified civil service of the United States in any position for which his qualifications fit him and where there is need of his services, without reference to the requirements of the civil service rules. This order is issued on the recommendation of the Secretary of the Interior.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 6220-Authorizing Appointment of Louis R. Glavis to Any Position in the Classified Civil Service Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/362041
